bibl.title: Drevneisii manuskript s territorii SSSR. Pis'mo iz rimskoi kreposti Apsar. Avec résumé en anglais: A Letter from a Roman Fortress on the Eastern Black Sea Coast.
bibl.note: A new interpretation of the letter (Fayum, 2nd c.) of a veteran stationed in Apsar. The letter provides interesting information about the garrison in Apsar and the strategic importance of its frontier fort.
bibl.seg: Speidel Michael P., Drevneisii manuskript s territorii SSSR. Pis'mo iz rimskoi kreposti Apsar. Avec résumé en anglais: A Letter from a Roman Fortress on the Eastern Black Sea Coast.
